LanguageData.AnAl_StatsReport_MeatRequired_Desc: The total meat yield required from the target animal(s) for the ritual to be able to create a chimera.
LanguageData.AnAl_PsychicRitualCreateChimera_NotEnoug: The target selected doesn't have enough meat to create a chimera. You need {MEATSTILLREQUIRED} more meat. If you perform the ritual anyways, the target will only become twisted meat on a success. A failure can still create a fleshbeast.

The targets selected don't have enough meat to create a chimera. You need {MEATSTILLREQUIRED} more meat. If you perform the ritual anyways, the targets will only become twisted meat on a success. A failure can still create a fleshbeast.
LanguageData.AnAl_PsychicRitualCreateChimera_BondedTa: The target {TARGET_nameDef} is bonded to {BONDEDPAWN_definite}. {BONDEDPAWN_pronoun} will be unhappy if {TARGET_nameDef} is used in the ritual.
The target {TARGET_nameDef} is bonded to colonists {BONDEDPAWNS}. They will be unhappy if {TARGET_nameDef} is used in the ritual.
